bRigid
Class BConvexHull

java.lang.Object
  bRigid.BObject
      bRigid.BConvexHull
All Implemented Interfaces:
BInterface
public class BConvexHull
extends BObject
implements BInterface

ConvexHull as rigidBody, List of vertices, PShapes or .obj files as input and calculates its convexHull for collisionDetection

Field Summary
 
Fields inherited from class bRigid.BObject
behaviors, collisionShape, displayShape, rigidBody, transform
 
Constructor Summary
BConvexHull(PApplet p, float mass,  vertices, Vector3f position, boolean inertia)
          takes an Array of Vertices as input and calculates its ConvexHull; the list should contain only unique Vertices if mass is set to 0: the body will be static, if inertia is false, the body will collide, but not rotate
BConvexHull(PApplet p, float mass, PShape mesh, Vector3f position, boolean inertia)
          takes a PShape as input and calculates its ConvexHull
BConvexHull(PApplet p, float mass, String fileName, Vector3f position, boolean inertia)
          takes an DataPath for an file.obj as input and calculates its ConvexHull;
BConvexHull(PApplet p, float mass, String fileName, Vector3f position, boolean inertia, boolean displayImportMesh)
          takes an DataPath for an file.obj as input and calculates its ConvexHull;

takes an Array of Vertices as input and calculates its ConvexHull; the list should contain only unique Vertices

if mass is set to 0: the body will be static, if inertia is false, the body will collide, but not rotate
